description: Surgical treatment for juvenile osteochondritis dissecans occurring with open epiphyseal plate (Evidence: pg no: 21, L925-L933)
scope: Treatment of OCD in children and adolescents (Evidence: pg no: 21, L922-L933)

documentation: Failure of 3 months of conservative management (e.g., immobilization, restricted weight-bearing, avoidance of sports activities) (Evidence: pg no: 21, L931-L932)
